Text: Pottery Barn Kids Order Confirmationkids emailpotterybarncomemailpbkoperationalpbkorderheadgif Order Dear Diana Scholtes Thank you for shopping with Pottery Barn Kids We have received your order and it is currently being processed Please see below for details Ship to Name Address Diana Scholtes Se Fernridge Drive For privacy reasons the city state and zip code have been omitted Item Description Item Qty Price Status Turtle Shaped Rug Available for immediate shipping Flower Shaped Pillow S Available for immediate shipping Pbk Daisy Rod Wht Available for immediate shipping Daisy Holdback Wht Available for immediate shipping Merchandise Subtotal Shipping Charge Tax Total We will continue to email the status of your order as each item is shipped You can always review the status of your order at wwwpotterybarnkidscomcs csFindexcfmFsectDwismobnridD Simply enter your order confirmation number and billing zip code to access the information If you ordered multiple items some items may be shipped separately with no additional shipping charges Thank you for your order Pottery Barn Kids Customer Service Weekdays am to pm Pacific time Saturday am to pm Pacific time To visit us online go to wwwpotterybarnkidscom homecfmFbnridD
